Tol_containment_ce_costs
========================

.. table:: Algorithm
   :widths: 15 15 15

   +---------------------------+-----------------------------------+----------------------------------------------+
   | **Algorithm Name**        | **What is this algorithm for?**   | **Description**                              |
   +===========================+===================================+==============================================+
   | tol_containment_ce_costs  | Variables                         | Total cost for each part of the containment. |
   +---------------------------+-----------------------------------+----------------------------------------------+
